name: Corona Run (Bic)
description:
During the lockdown due to coronavirus pandemic,

we can go  outside a bit, but it can be very dangerous, because CORONAVIRUS IS EVERYWHERE!

So you should try not to touch anybody! Or you will be contaminated and you will DIE!

So don't forget to wear a mask!

Features:

- An endless runner

- completely in the 2020 news

- A game completely made by one person, from the music to the code!

Controls:

- use the keyboard arrows or WASD to move up, left, down and right.
